title: Can love become an obsession? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all u need to understand what is love...I remember a friend of mine said to me there is no selfishness in love and I agree on that quote. Now u say u get hurt everytime. U need to focus on that first. Why u get hurt ?? The answer is very simple even though it does not look that simple. The answer is that you are expecting and hoping certain things from your partner. If you stop doing these things you'll never get hurt again. You have to remember this equation...No Hopes + No Expectations = Happiness ☺ Good Luck.
